title: Use Conservation of Momentum
text: the conservation of momentum suggests that $$p_{before}=p_{after}$$. Here, $$p_{before}=m_{asteriod} v_{m,asteriod}$$ + $$m_{moon} v_{moon}$$, and $$p_{after}=\left(m_{asteriod}+m_{moon}\right) v_{final}$$.

title: Use Conservation of Momentum to Solve For $$v_{final}$$
